notesStmt.note: Writing in some parts illegible due to dampness. First leaves partly damaged.

Folio 128-134 belong to the 17th century and contain a fragment of the same commentary on Bava Ḳama, chapter 3 to 7).Folio 134 is a fragment of the same commentary on Ketuvot (parts of 5th and 6th chapter). Yosef Kohen: inscribed in a note, folio .
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
